articles.title: Events Held to Remember President Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Events Held to Remember President Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The remembrance meeting of school youth and children titled "The Sun and the Youth" and a similar meeting of members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea and other women entitled "The Songun Revolutionary Cause Is Everlasting" were separately held at the Central Youth Hall and the Women's Hall on Monday on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, and others who took the floor recalled at the meeting of school youth and children that Kim Il Sung put forward the unique idea and theory on the Juche-oriented youth movement and pursued the politics of attaching importance to youth, thereby leading the Korean youth movement to victory and glory. 
					
					 Looking back on the glorious days when they had the honor of being received by the President and accorded profound loving care and benevolence by him, they stressed that the President was the real father for all the Korean people.
					
					 They also related the story that the President led the school youth and children and bereaved children of the revolutionaries to fully prepare themselves as heirs to the revolution and juvenile guards by inheriting the indomitable revolutionary spirit and noble soul of the anti-Japanese forerunners and creditably fulfill their duties on the road of defending the country and achieving the prosperity of the country.
					
					 Ro Song Sil, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the women's union, and other women who took the floor at the women's meeting said that Kim Il Sung put the women's position to the highest level and let the Korean women, who had once been subject to maltreatment and insult, emerge revolutionaries and give full play to their wisdom and mettle in the work for the country's prosperity.
					
					  They told the attendants that Kim Il Sung looked after the children as their real parents would do, regarding them as a treasure of the country. 
					
					 The speakers at the meetings evinced their resolution to remain true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men Praised by Mexican Figure
articles.content:
Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men Praised by Mexican Figure
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, published a statement on June 29 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Saying that the President, the father of socialist Korea, is immortal as the sun indicating the way of consolidating and developing the DPRK, the statement praised the President for founding the Juche idea and Songun idea reflecting the practical requirements of the Korean revolution. 
					
					 The statement noted that Kim Jong Il, General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, has steadily steered socialist Korea to frustrate all moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique against the DPRK, holding high the banner of the Juche idea and Songun.
					
					The cause of global independence is sure to triumph thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, successor to the cause of the President, the statement declared.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Polish Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Polish Ambassador
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a conversation with Polish Ambassador to the DPRK Roman Iwaszkiewicz at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday when the ambassador paid a farewell call on him.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Thai Delegation
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Thai Delegation
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, met and had a talk with a delegation of the Thai Foreign Ministry headed by Vice-Minister Panich Vikitsreth at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Chairman of International Kim Il Sung Foundation Here
articles.content:
Chairman of International Kim Il Sung Foundation Here
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Johnny Hon, chairman of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation, and his party came here on Monday. 
					 Also arriving was a delegation of the Foreign Ministry of Thailand led by Vice-Minister Panich Vikitsreth.

articles.title: DPRK Delegate Reiterates Its Stand on Terrorism
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate Reiterates Its Stand on Terrorism
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- It is the consistent stand of the Government of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to resolutely oppose all forms of terrorism and any support to it, declared a delegate of the DPRK addressing the meeting of the Special Committee on International Terrorism held on June 29.
					 Terrorism is now steadily escalating in different parts of the world despite the international efforts to combat it, seriously threatening the lives of people, stability of societies and world peace and security and, furthermore, infringement upon sovereign states and extreme human rights abuses are being justified under the pretext of "war on terrorism", he noted, and continued: The United States invaded Afghanistan and Iraq and is escalating the "anti-terror war" not only in those countries but into their neighboring countries, massacring civilians. This is typical of state-sponsored terrorism and hideous human rights abuses. 
					
					 If such state-sponsored terrorism is allowed to go on, international efforts to put an end to it will never prove successful.
					
					 All forms of struggle against terrorism should be waged in conformity with the objective and principles of the UN Charter and international law under any circumstances. 
					
					 The DPRK delegation is of the view that what is most important for finally eradicating the root cause of terrorism is to ensure the independent development and equality of all countries and nations. 
					
					 To this end it is necessary to establish a new international order based on mutual respect, equality, friendship and cooperation whereby all countries and nations may fully exercise their rights to independently live and develop.
					
					 The DPRK Government will creditably fulfil its responsibility and duty as a UN member state to finally put an end to all forms of terrorism and build a peaceful and prosperous world in the future, too, he concluded.

articles.title: Hong Un Jong Wins Gold Medal at Universiade 2009
articles.content:
Hong Un Jong Wins Gold Medal at Universiade 2009
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Hong Un Jong of the DPRK won a gold medal at the Universiade 2009 now under way in Belgrade, Serbia.
					 She came first in the long horse event of female gymnastics on July 5.

articles.title: Wind Power Resources Widely Used in DPRK
articles.content:
Wind Power Resources Widely Used in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea directs great attention to the production of electricity by use of wind power along with hydraulic power.
					Unchon County of South Hwanghae Province has set up thousands of wind power generators in dwelling houses and public buildings by making best use of the rich wind power resources.
					
					The wind power generators for families ensure electricity to room lighting, TV and others for their cultural and emotion life.
					
					The electricity output produced by the wind power generators set up in the county is tantamount to that produced by a minor power station.
					
					Wind power generators have been installed in some rural villages newly built on hills and at the foot of the mountains in accordance with their physiographical conditions in Haeju City, Kangryong County, Ongjin County, Yonan County, Jangyon County, Anak County and Chongdan County.
					
					Yomju County and Uiju County of North Phyongan Province and other areas of Korea are striving hard to use the wind power resources, registering rich experience and achievements.

articles.title: Rural Community of Korea Conspicuous with True Feature of Socialism
articles.content:
Rural Community of Korea Conspicuous with True Feature of Socialism
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The three revolutions, ideological, technical and cultural, have been pushed ahead and the assistance to and leadership over the countryside by the government stepped up, making it possible to assimilate the peasantry to the working class and industrialize agriculture rapidly and change the looks of the countryside day by day.
					 The fields under cultivation have been standardized like a paduk (go) board and unique gravity-fed waterways and many dwelling houses have been constructed across the country to convert the countryside into a socialist fairyland good to live in.
					
					 Typical of such model farms are the Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, the Sinam Co-op Farm in Ryongchon County, North Phyongan Province, the Chongsan Co-op Farm in Kangso County, South Phyongan Province and the Samjigang Co-op Farm in Jaeryong County, South Hwanghae Province and others.
					
					 The Migok Co-op Farm has constructed dwelling houses in tiers so as to see the vast field and the road leads to each block and each house. A large orchard has been arranged in front of the village and a resting site built on the hill covered with forests.
					
					 Wonderful is the landscape of the Ryongchon Plain in North Phyongan Province where life-giving water is flowing along the Paekma-Cholsan Waterway and rice plants are growing well in the standardized paddy fields.
					
					 Poman-ri, Sohung County, North Hwanghae Province, was once an out-of-the-way place with nothing to show except wild geese flying over it. But it, with a fishing farm in front of it and a forest of fruit trees in the rear, is now called one of the eight beautiful spots in the Songun era.
					
					 The horizon in Handure Plain and sea of potato-flowers at Taehongdan are also well known among the Koreans as ones of the above-said beautiful spots.
					
					 Electricity finds its way to all parts of the country and methane gas has been introduced to villages. Increasing in number are apricot tree villages and houses with many pear trees and persimmon trees where all sorts of flowers are in full bloom in spring and are pervaded with fruit aroma in summer and autumn. 
					
					 While giving field guidance to the Tongbong Co-op Farm in Hamju County, South Hamgyong Province some time ago, General Secretary Kim Jong Il said that the farm village with cozy modern dwelling houses built on a sunny hillside and the co-op fields where green crops are swaying and farm machines are working look like a beautiful picture. He stressed that this is the laudable real feature of our socialist rural community.
					
					 Today the agricultural working people of Korea are all out to bring about a turn in the agricultural production with the responsibility for being in charge of the main front for the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: More Declarations on Situation Issued in S. Korea
articles.content:
More Declarations on Situation Issued in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- At least 230 cartoonists of south Korea issued a declaration on the situation on July 2 in protest against the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' unpopular rule.
					 It deplored that democracy has been violated in south Korean society and economy has gone totally bankrupt. Lee Myung Bak and other ruling conservative forces should know clearly what judgment of history those dictators keen on pursuing undemocratic policies met, it warned.
					
					 It stressed that positive efforts would be made to build a society where the people become its master.
					
					 More than 260 artists, persons of literature and critics affiliated to the "Society of Juvenile Book Writers of Dreaming of a Better World" also issued a declaration on the situation on the same day in the very place where evacuees in Ryongsan of Seoul met tragic deaths.
					
					 In the declaration they urged the authorities to stop at once the forcible evacuation in Ryongsan and unconditionally accept the demands of the All-People Measure Committee against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan and the bereaved families of the victims.
					
					 They demanded Lee Myung Bak and the "Grand National Party" make an apology to the people, stop the moves to adopt the unpopular "Lee Myung Bak evil laws" and halt the unreasonable suppression of teachers affiliated to the Teachers Union.

articles.title: Fascist Group's Drill Hinting at Second Ryongsan Tragedy Flailed
articles.content:
Fascist Group's Drill Hinting at Second Ryongsan Tragedy Flailed
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The police "commando" belonging to the puppet Seoul District Police Agency of south Korea openly staged a repressive drill in a drill ground in Seoul on July 2 after creating an atmosphere reminiscent of the scene of tragic death in Ryongsan under the signboard of the "combined anti-terrorism exercise".
					 This rampage of the fascists is touching off bitter indignation among the south Korean people.
					
					 The All-People Measure Committee against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan accused the police of working hard to create the same repressive atmosphere as done before though it is under strong fire for committing brutal murder.
					
					 The secretary general of the Citizens Solidarity for Human Rights termed the above-said drill a very shameless and brutal act as it is little short of branding the slain evacuees as "terrorists".
					
					 The bereaved families of the slain evacuees in Ryongsan said that they could not repress astonishment at the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' thrice-cursed atrocities.
					
					 In another development, the Democratic Labor Party, the Democratic Party and other opposition parties held a joint press conference on July 3 denouncing the recent rash act of the police authorities as an act of discarding even the slightest human sense of obligation towards the evacuees in Ryongsan.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Suppression Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Suppression Flayed
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea (Jongyojo) held a press conference in Seoul on July 3 at which it denounced the Lee Myung Bak fascist group for forcibly searching office rooms of the organization. 
					 A press release was read out at the press conference. Recalling that that day the fascist police carried out a search operation against the office rooms of the headquarters of the organization and its Seoul branch after strictly cordoning them off, the release went on:
					
					 This fascist tyranny only revealed the impatient behavior of the group of traitors in the grip of a crisis. 
					
					 Not content with these actions, the Lee group worked out a shameless scenario for groundlessly linking the teachers' movement for issuing declarations on the situation with the opposition parties and is contemplating labeling the activities of Jongyojo politically motivated ones. 
					
					 With no suppression can the group break the will of the teachers' struggle for the democratization of the society, the press release declared, adding that the above-said movement would go on in the future, too. 
					
					 The press release urged the Lee group to stop at once the moves to stamp out the said movement and lend an ear to the voices of the teachers. 
					
					 The All-People Measure Committee for Opposing the south Korean Puppet Authorities' Unreasonable Dismissal issued a statement on July 1 at which it denounced the group of traitors' fascist suppression of the strike staged by members of Ssang Yong Motor Car Trade Union.

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in South Africa
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in South Africa
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A South African national preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was formed with due ceremony on June 28.
					 The chairman of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the ceremony. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural functions such as seminar on the President's exploits, lecture, photo exhibition and film show from July 8, 2009 to April 15, 2012

articles.title: Events of Solidarity with Korean People Held Abroad
articles.content:
Events of Solidarity with Korean People Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- An anti-U.S. demonstration took place in UK and a film show in Finland on June 25 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle. 
					 The demonstration was participated in by members of the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain.
					
					 The demonstrators exposed and denounced the U.S. imperialists for provoking the Korean war and their ambition for aggression. 
					
					 They denounced such vicious move of the U.S. as instigating the UN Security Council to adopt a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK. 
					
					 The show of the Korean film "Reply of DPRK" held in Finland was attended by figures from all walks of life and people.

articles.title: Earnest Request
articles.content:
Earnest Request
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- It was in March Juche 95 (2006) when General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il called at the newly built Pegaebong Noodle Shop in the township of Samjiyon County.
					 He looked round the cuisine on the first floor before going upstairs.
					
					 Indicating the partitions in the popular dining-room, he strictly reproached the officials for partitioning the popular dining-room, saying that it was good for the customers to take noodle all together in the room.
					
					 He earnestly persuaded the officials not to do such a work in the country where the priority is given to the people.
					
					 The officials kept deep in their minds his words containing the idea that they should not allow any trifling elements discriminating the people but always respect and serve them in good faith.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la roturacion de la marisma en la isla Taegye
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la roturacion de la marisma en la isla Taegye
Pyongyang, 6 de julio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente   Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la roturacion de la marisma en la isla Taegye de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte.
					 Tras escuchar explicaciones ante el plano de la obra, el Dirigente recorrio por varias horas el dique levantado gigantescamente y el campo de construccion averiguando en detalles como marcha la roturacion de la marisma.
					
					 El Dirigente aprecio mucho los meritos de los constructores destacando que estos hombres ilimitadamente fieles al partido hicieron otra magna creacion, que brillara siempre junto con la era del Songun (priorizacion militar), superando con valentia las dificultades y pruebas y dando pruebas de su heroismo masivo e incomparable abnegacion.
					
					 El hecho de que ellos terminaron en lo principal esta gran obra de transformacion de la naturaleza, comparable con la construccion del Complejo Hidraulico del Mar Oeste, es el valioso resultado de la indoblegable voluntad de nuestro pueblo decidido a edificar sin falta en la tierra patria una gran potencia prospera con nuestras fuerzas y tecnicas y la manifestacion de la inagotable potencia espiritual del heroico pueblo coreano unido monoliticamente en torno al partido, subrayo.
					
					 Los constructores ansiosos por cumplir el legado del Presidente Kim Il Sung son valientes conquistadores del mar y combatientes indoblegables, que ampliaron la extension geografica de la patria desafiando a las mareas bravas, apunto y agrego que ellos son los creadores de meritos que estaran presentes para siempre en la memoria de la patria y el pueblo.
					
					 A continuacion, el Dirigente estuvo en el arrozal del polder roturado informandose de la situacion de la agricultura.
					
					 Al contemplar las llanuras extendidas interminablemente, donde estaban plantadas las posturas de arroz haciendo imaginar una alfombra verde, destaco que este paisaje es realmente maravilloso mostrandose muy satisfecho de la creacion de otra granja socialista de gran dimension. 
					
					 Se alegro mucho cuando se informo del aumento anual del rendimiento de esas llanuras y enseno los remedios para el cultivo eficiente en la marisma roturada.
					
					 Presento las tareas para terminar con adelanto la roturacion de la marisma en la isla Taegye enfatizando que esta obra es una de las labores importantes para la prosperidad del pais.
					
					 Dado que esta obra es una dificil y enorme labor de transformacion de la naturaleza, hay que prestarle la atencion estatal, en particular, tomar estrictamente las medidas necesarias a ella.
					
					Ampliar la tierra, patrimonio eterno de la patria, es la labor importante para la felicidad de todas las generaciones venideras y la prosperidad del pais, ratifico y expreso la gran esperanza y conviccion de que los constructores demostraran otra vez el temperamento revolucionario de la heroica clase obrera de Corea al cumplir magnificamente su noble y sagrada mision y deber.
					
					 Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Kim Phyong Hae, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek, y los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang y Ri Je Gang.

articles.title: Prosiguen actos en homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Prosiguen actos en homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 6 de julio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 15 del fallecimiento (8 de julio) del Presidente Kim Il Sung, tuvieron lugar este lunes en la Casa Central de la Juventud y la Casa de Mujeres, respectivamente, la escena de recordacion de los jovenes y ninos escolares intitulada "El Sol y la juventud" y el acto similar de las miembros de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea y otras feminas bajo el titulo de "Es eterna la causa de la revolucion  del Songun (priorizacion militar)".
					El primer secretario del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Ri Yong Chol, y otros oradores dijeron que el Presidente presento la original idea y teoria sobre el movimiento juvenil del Juche y practico la politica de dar importancia a la juventud conduciendo al camino de victoria y gloria el movimiento juvenil coreano.
					
					Al evocar aquellos dias gloriosos en que fueron recibidos por el Presidente y disfrutaron de sus grandes benevolencias, ellos enfatizaron que el fue el padre de todo el pueblo coreano.
					
					Agregaron que el Presidente hizo que los jovenes y ninos escolares y los hijos de los martires revolucionarios se prepararan firmemente como continuadores de la revolucion y vanguardia infantil heredando el indoblegable espiritu revolucionario y la noble alma de los martires antijaponeses y cumplieran fielmente su deber en el camino por la defensa de la patria y la prosperidad del pais.
					
					En el acto de las mujeres la presidenta del Comite Central de la UMDC, Ro Song Sil, y otras senalaron que el Presidente Kim Il Sung puso la posicion de las mujeres en el nivel mas alto e hizo que las coreanas, que en el pasado vivian maltratadas y despreciadas, crecieran como revolucionarias que manifiestan plenamente su inteligencia y temperamento en el camino por la prosperidad del pais.
					
					Recordaron que el Presidente cuido a los ninos con el afecto paternal considerandolos como tesoro del pais.
					
					Los oradores en estas ocasiones expresaron la firme determinacion de apoyar con fidelidad la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.

articles.title: Delegado coreano ratifica rechazo a todas las formas del terrorismo
articles.content:
Delegado coreano ratifica rechazo a todas las formas del terrorismo
 Pyongyang, 6 de julio (ATCC) -- En su discurso pronunciado el 29 de junio en la reunion de la comision especial sobre el terrorismo internacional, el delegado coreano ratifico la invariable posicion del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de oponerse a todas las formas del terrorismo y a cualquier apoyo a este.
					 Pese a los esfuerzos internacionales por eliminar los actos terroristas, estos se amplian constantemente en todas partes del mundo amenazando gravemente la vida de las personas, la estabilidad social, la paz y la seguridad del mundo, comenzo el y continuo:
					
					 En particular, bajo el pretexto de la "guerra antiterrorista", se justifican la trasgresion a los paises soberanos y los casos de flagrante violacion de los derechos humanos.
					
					 El caso tipico del terrorismo de Estado y la violacion de DDHH de gran envergadura lo dio EE.UU. que comete el genocidio de civiles no solo en los invadidos Afganistan e Iraq sino tambien en los paises vecinos adonde fue expandida la "guerra antiterrorista".
					
					Si se permiten tales actos terroristas de Estado, nunca seran fructiferos los esfuerzos internacionales por poner fin al terrorismo.
					
					 Toda la lucha antiterrorista debe librarse en estricto apego al objetivo y principios de la Carta de la ONU y al derecho internacional.
					
					 La delegacion coreana considera que lo mas importante para eliminar de raices el terrorismo es asegurar el desarrollo independiente y la igualdad entre todos los paises y naciones.
					
					 Para este fin, es preciso establecer el nuevo orden internacional basado en el respeto mutuo, la igualdad, la amistad y la cooperacion que permita a todos los paises y naciones ejercer plenamente su derecho a vivir y desarrollarse de manera independiente.
					
					 En el futuro tambien, el gobierno de la RPDC sera fiel a su responsabilidad y deber como miembro de la ONU para acabar de raices todas las formas del terrorismo y construir un mundo pacifico y prospero.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena la represion de la banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena la represion de la banda de Lee Myung Bak 
 Pyongyang, 6 de julio (ATCC) -- La banda de Lee Myung Bak fortalece mas que nunca la represion contra las entidades progresistas, lo cual deviene la vil y descarada maniobra para reprimir freneticamente la justa lucha de los habitantes surcoreanos aspirantes a la independencia y la democracia de la sociedad y la reunificacion de la patria y fortalecer su dictadura fascista.
					 Asi senala el periodico  Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 5 y continua:
					
					 No podran ser tolerados jamas los alborotos de represion fascista contra los hombres de palabra de la Radio "MBC" y los profesores pertenecientes al "Sindicato Nacional de Ensenantes".
					
					 Tal represion perpetrada bajo el pretexto de la "informacion tergiversada" y "acto ilegal" demuestra que llegan al climax las maniobras represivas de la banda traidora contra las entidades progresistas.
					
					 La represion fascista de la banda de Lee Myung Bak contra las fuerzas del movimiento progresista demuestra la ambicion  de esta camarilla titere para fortalecer su pesima politica antidemocratica y antipopular.
					
					 A fin de realizar su ambicion politica la banda de Lee no vacila en perpetrar sucios actos de toda indole.
					
					 Ahora, los habitantes surcoreanos, expresando su gran indignacion a esa represion vil y perversa de la banda de Lee, desarrollan con mas valentia la lucha anti-"gubernamental". Esto resulta un acto muy justo.
					
					 Cuanto mas la banda de Lee maniobra con ojos inyectados de sangre para suprimir las actividades progresistas y patrioticas de los habitantes surcoreanos tanto mas anticipara su vergonzosa derrota.
